attributes.action: Establish a regulatory and licencing framework for developers of new build homes
attributes.additional_details: Change the current laws and loopholes to stop company directors earning big bonuses and they should be held accountable for cover ups and flouting building regulations. They should be licenced with similar guidelines that apply to the financial industry.
attributes.background:
The government should create a regulatory and licencing framework for 
developers of new-build homes, so that developers and their directors can be held to account due to growing complaints about new houses.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637649
